Text:
When you upload a torrent to TPB, and create a torrent posting such as this, it is a very good idea to give the torrent posting a relevant title, such as the name of the album or the name of the artist(s) that recorded it.

Calling a torrent posting "FLAC", does not inform anyone as to what this torrent is about.
Very few of our users are mind readers.
Track #6 is corupt...... what ever it is...
This is The Smashing Pumpkins "Gish" album....
